column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Yoooooo! I don't write many reviews
column2: only when a place really speaks to me. And Jinya came in loud and clear! The spicy chicken ramen was incredible
column3: my fiance had the wonton ramen that was also great. Kristine our server was really nice and chatted with us for a bit. And their in restaurant radio played alot of reggae (Japanese love reggae and Jamaica
column4: so as a Jamaican I felt right at home). 2 thumbs way up for Jinya!
